fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (White)(Blue) each night.
- (1) Attack a player each night.
- (White)(Blue): Sacrifice yourself to let every other Gatherer use up to three abilities tonight, as long as they can afford the Mana costs.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Before the game begins, you may prevent a random other Gatherer (or yourself if there are no others) from talking and voting in Day 1. If you do, give yourself permanent basic defense which cannot be reduced.
- Nothing can allow you to survive a successful use of your Sacrifice ability.
